1491210.name: TimeLab: LZ 129 Hindenburg
1491210.description:
Hindenburg - LZ129: TimeLab DLC
The Virtual Time Travel Experience...
Embark on a journey aboard the legendary airship Hindenburg in the year 1936. Walk through the luxurious passenger decks, marvel at old New York as the Hindenburg floats above the skyscrapers, and witness its final voyage...

Features:

• Immersive Simulation – Step into the world of the 1930s and experience the journey of the Hindenburg in breathtaking detail. Discover the technical innovations and daily life aboard the world's largest airship.

• Explore the Hindenburg – Enter the luxurious passenger areas, the dining hall, and the lounge, or take a look at the technical sections like the control room and hydrogen tanks.

• Historical Insights – Learn fascinating details about the construction, operation, and tragic explosion of the airship, and immerse yourself in aviation history.

• Bonus Game: "Skywave" – Test your skills in a retro-style game where you navigate a stylized zeppelin through skyscrapers and enjoy neon-lit landscapes.

Experience the grandeur and elegance of the Hindenburg and be captivated by one of the most impressive chapters in aviation history. A must for history and technology enthusiasts!

Now available on Steam!

Please note: This DLC requires our VR platform TimeLab, also available on Steam.
